original_title: LITRO to announce gas price revision tomorrow: Chairman
original_body_lines: Considering the current gas price increase in the world market, the decision on domestic gas price revision will be announced tomorrow, LITRO Lanka Chairman Muditha Peiris said.
He told the Daily Mirror that he hopes the prices will remain the same.
Earlier, the LITRO company decided to increase the gas prices, considering the gas price inflation in the world market.
However, the decision about the gas price revision will be announced tomorrow. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
